Visualizations

Examples of visualizations created with data from the archive

Interactive map: SPA Correspondence Sites
Visualization of Prokofiev’s global network of correspondents using database management and geolocation tools; based on the archive’s holdings of over 10,000 pieces of personal and business correspondence.



Alluvial chart: Prokofiev annotated his manuscripts in a variety of languages. This chart illustrates the languages he used in relation to the musical genres he worked in and the different arrangements of his compositions.
